level.heading: NOTICE REQUIREMENTS FOR CHANGES IN OPERATION (ยง 29-321)

level.text: Each Facility shall inform the Director, in writing, of any of the following planned changes in operation no less than ten (10) days before implementation of the change(s):
Change in location, name and/or telephone number of the Facility;
Renovation or alteration of the premises that substantially changes the indoor or outdoor space of the Facility;
In the case of a Child Development Home, the inclusion of an additional member in the household, including the new member’s criminal history, if any;
In the case of a Child Development Home, a change in primary Caregiver(s);
In the case of a Child Development Center, a change in Center Director; or
A significant change in the operation of the program, including, but not limited to, hours of operation, services provided, and capacity load.
If a Facility undergoes any of the changes in operation listed in subsection 321.1 without the change being planned in advance, the Facility shall notify the Director immediately.
Upon notification of the proposed change(s), the Director may inspect the Facility to evaluate the impact of the change(s) on the provision of child development services.
The Director shall issue an amended license, consistent with the approved change(s), as required by and subject to the provisions of this Chapter.
